original_title: , not like us. Not like us
overview: , not like us. Not like us draws inspiration from Lukin Linklater’s book of poetry, Slow Scrape. Specifically, this work cites her writing about girlhood as a response to the attempted assassination of girls’ education activist, Malala Yousafzai. , not like us. Not like us, centres memory through dance, image, and text.
title: , not like us. Not like us
